text:
Hello Everyone I am facing a challenge, In the below screenshot I'm showing 2 posts per page with HubSpot blogs default pagination now I want to apply multiple filters to this post and the filter also has 2 types of resource filters (by blog topic, by blog type).
So I don't know how can i create multiple filters?
HubSpot provides only tags to add from the backend and it doesn't have any other way to add another resource.

I have tried with custom fields but I don't know how can use custom fields to filter posts with pagination. I tried many ways to apply a global filter but didn't find any solution, please anyone help me with this
Hi, not sure I'm on the good channel, I created an application and the app is showing on the right bar of my production account. Do you know if it's possible to add it in the middle of the column?
